title: Hour 2: What Color Is YOUR Heart?
description:
Mike recaps his experience at the Buccaneers-Chiefs game, Dan would rather lose than bet on Andy Dalton, and everyone on both sides of the Tua concussion conversation is mad at us. Then, Stugotz presents his Weekend Observations.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
